mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY REVIEW_INDEX DESC) RNUM, REVIEW_INDEX, USER_ID, REVIEW_DATE, REVIEW_TITLE, REVIEW_CONTENT, REVIEW_ORIGINAL, REVIEW_NEW_IMG, REVIEW_FILE_SIZE, DEL_GB FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY REVIEW_INDEX DESC) RNUM, REVIEW_INDEX, USER_ID, REVIEW_DATE, REVIEW_TITLE, REVIEW_CONTENT, REVIEW_ORIGINAL, REVIEW_NEW_IMG, REVIEW_FILE_SIZE, DEL_GB FROM TB_REVIEW WHERE DEL_GB = 'N')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_REVIEW( REVIEW_INDEX, USER_ID, REVIEW_TITLE, REVIEW_CONTENT, REVIEW_ORIGINAL, REVIEW_NEW_IMG, REVIEW_FILE_SIZE ) VALUES( TB_REVIEW_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{USER_ID}, #{REVIEW_TITLE}, #{REVIEW_CONTENT}, #{REVIEW_ORIGINAL}, #{REVIEW_NEW_IMG}, #{REVIEW_FILE_SIZE} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TB_REVIEW WHERE REVIEW_INDEX = #{REVIEW_INDEX} AND USER_ID = #{USER_ID}
mapper.delete: UPDATE TB_REVIEW SET DEL_GB = 'Y' WHERE REVIEW_INDEX = #{REVIEW_INDEX}
mapper.select: SELECT REVIEW_INDEX, REVIEW_TITLE, REVIEW_CONTENT, REVIEW_ORIGINAL, REVIEW_NEW_IMG, REVIEW_FILE_SIZE FROM TB_REVIEW WHERE REVIEW_INDEX = #{REVIEW_INDEX}
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_REVIEW SET REVIEW_TITLE = #{REVIEW_TITLE}, REVIEW_CONTENT = #{REVIEW_CONTENT}, REVIEW_ORIGINAL = #{REVIEW_ORIGINAL}, REVIEW_NEW_IMG = #{REVIEW_NEW_IMG}, REVIEW_FILE_SIZE = #{REVIEW_FILE_SIZE} WHERE USER_ID = #{USER_ID} AND REVIEW_INDEX = #{REVIEW_INDEX}
